statements: SELECT * FROM customer_watchlist;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM customer_watchlist;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_watchlist ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_watchlist WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, name, dob, government_watchlist_match FROM customer_watchlist;
SELECT * FROM customer_watchlist WHERE government_watchlist_match = TRUE;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM customer_watchlist WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_watchlist ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_watchlist WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customer_watchlist WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT watchlist_name FROM watchlists WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN watchlists ON customers.id = watchlists.customer_id WHERE watchlist_type = 'Movies' AND address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT customers.name, watchlists.watchlist_name FROM customers INNER JOIN watchlists ON customers.id = watchlists.customer_id WHERE customers.id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(id), phone_number FROM customers GROUP BY phone_number ORDER BY COUNT(id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE government_watchlist_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_name, government_watchlist_flag FROM customer_data WHERE government_watchlist_flag = TRUE
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC

SELECT customer_name, watchlist_name FROM customer_data INNER JOIN flag_history ON customer_data.customer_id = flag_history.customer_id INNER JOIN watchlists ON flag_history.watchlist_id = watchlists.watchlist_id
SELECT customer_name, flag_date FROM customer_data INNER JOIN flag_history ON customer_data.customer_id = flag_history.customer_id WHERE flag_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM watchlists WHERE watchlist_id = 3;
SELECT watchlist_name FROM watchlists WHERE watchlist_description LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_watchlist ON customers.customer_id = customer_watchlist.customer_id WHERE customer_watchlist.watchlist_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM customers LEFT JOIN risk_flags ON customers.customer_id = risk_flags.customer_id WHERE risk_flags.flag_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT watchlist_name, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM watchlists INNER JOIN customer_watchlist ON watchlists.watchlist_id = customer_watchlist.watchlist_id GROUP BY watchlist_name HAVING customer_count > 5 ORDER BY customer_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE government_watchlist_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';

SELECT c.customer_name, w.watchlist_name, cw.flag_reason FROM CustomerData c INNER JOIN CustomerWatchlist cw ON c.customer_id = cw.customer_id INNER JOIN Watchlist w ON cw.watchlist_id = w.watchlist_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerData WHERE government_watchlist_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, w.watchlist_name, cw.flag_reason FROM CustomerData c JOIN CustomerWatchlist cw ON c.customer_id = cw.customer_id JOIN Watchlist w ON cw.watchlist_id = w.watchlist_id;

SELECT cn.notification_id, cd.customer_name, cn.notification_message, cn.notification_date FROM RiskNotifications cn JOIN CustomerData cd ON cn.customer_id = cd.customer_id WHERE cn.notification_date > '2022-01-01';
